comment: Amazing professor. Being that the class contemporary issues, he picks very relevant topics to discuss during class. There is a lot of reading involved and the majority of the test material is from the reading, so make sure to read. Instead of a paper, he will give you a creative project which is pretty easy.

Dr. Herndon is a great teacher! he will give serious lectures to the class to prepare everyone for the future and how we should prepare for the "real world" now. you should take notes in class on things he doesn't necessarily put on the powerpoint slides (he provides them online) &he explains what we need to know from the text. easy with EFFORT

TAKE HIM!!!! He's really nice and down to earth. His tests aren't easy but if you put in effort to study you'll get at least a B. He really wants his students to succeed and he's great to have a conversation with. Try to take as many classes as you can with him.

Dr. Herndon is an excellent resource for any Communications student.  He has a very clear view of the "industry" & offers his help to anyone who asks for it.  His lectures are clear & he has great ppts.  He is a helpful teacher & is very 'mentor worthy.'  Dr. Herndon's life lessons are very inspiring & he is a wonderful person/teacher.
Very helpful and informative. Is a fun and interesting class. test are not that bad, I would take him again if I could and recommend him.
Cool man, easy, clear, and presents info in a way anyone can understand. A+++
Very funny, quirky man. Super clear and wants you to pass his class. His tests are super easy and even gives extra credit. Really nice take him!
Professor Herndon is awesome. He's very easy and fun. KSU 1101 was an easy A. He's very helpful and lenient, and wants you to make the best grade you can. Take him!

He posts all of his power point slides and every test question is from the slides. Apart from it being a really easy class, Herndon is a stellar guy. He is really passionate about Communication and life. He is super clear about what he wants from you. You'd have to be an idiot to fail his class.

My friends and I have started just calling him Keith. He looks a bit like Mr. Rogers, and he's very funny. Definitely worth taking him for any class, though I only had to take him for my Freshman Seminar. If I was going into the Communications field, I would definitely take more classes with him. He even made an effort to learn all of our names.

Professor Herndon is a excellent teacher.  If you have to take Research Methods, I would only take it with him.  He made everything clear and he goes the extra mile to make sure you get what you need.  He is very mild mannered and funny.  In  our class at the end of the semester, he had awards for the Research assignment and gave out prizes.

Keith Herndon is an excellent professor.  Not only is he highly knowledgeable but he is also enthusiastic about teaching and has a friendly demeanor.  Everything, from the course material to the course expectations, is explained clearly and thoroughly in addition to being relevant.  He has high expectations but he is fair too.
